origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenEnergyAPI.analyze_feasibility', 'description': 'This function analyzes the feasibility of investing in green energy projects based on provided project data and analysis type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'project_data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The data to be analyzed, e.g., last_year_operation_data, historical_performance.'}, {'name': 'analysis_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., investment_feasibility, risk_assessment.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_result', 'description': 'The result of the feasibility analysis for the specified project data and analysis type.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenEnergyAPI.analyze_feasibility, 它的参数输入如下: 'project_data'是'last_year_operation_data', 'analysis_type'是'investment_feasibility'.
